data.text: Dooɠo foloi ta, Yesu lɛɛni Faliziɛinti ta-ɠundiɠii gila ná-pɛlɛi wu ga ti daamii wo. Niiti ti ɠɛni ná, naati ti ɠɛni pɛtɛsu.
Zunui ɠila ge loni kakala, nii fe seeɓɛi ɠɛni ba.
Yesu kpɔɛi zeɠeni, é ɠɛ tɔ kalamɔinti ta Faliziɛinti ma: «Tɔgi vaaʋɛ nɛi bu ga nu nu ɠɛdɛ dooɠo foloi?»
Kɛlɛ ti maaɠɛni kpɔ. Yesu seeɓɛ nui zoni naazu, é kɛdɛ, é naa ɠaaɠale ma.
Naa ʋoluma é ɠɛni ti ma: «Ɓɛ ɠa é wo zaama, ni ná-doun zunui ɓaa ná-nikɛi ɠa loona ziɛyeɠei zu, é la kulaa su gaama, anɛɛ dooɠo foloi ʋe?»
Kɛlɛ ti la ɠɛni zooni ti ʋa naama wooɠaaʋotegi ve zea.
Yesu kaai ma ga nui niiti ti loligai daami wosuʋɛ, ti pɛ ti ɠɛni lɛbiya zeizuʋɛti nɔ ɠaiziɛzu, é niima vaalaalii woni ti ma, é ɠɛ ma:
«Ni nui ta ɠa è lolina vulu laamii wosuʋɛ, mina li, ɗa ʋa zei ʋelela ɓɔkpɔgi ma, nii a kɛ ni é nui taɠili toligɛ, nii gaazu unfegi wɔɔlɔai ɗɔnɔi ʋa,
wo loli nui mina ʋa, é ʋa ɠɛ è ma: ‹Seizuʋɛ nii ve zunui nii ya.› Ɗa ɠɛ unfesu naazu, siɛgi zu è liizu la zeizu ʋoluzu ɓɔkpɔgi ma.

Kɛlɛ ni è loligɛ, li, è zei ʋoluzuʋɛ, naazu siɛgi zu è loli nui ʋaazu la, é ɠɛ è ma: ‹Bɔɛ, wuzeɠe, è lɛ ʋelelaʋɛ.› Naa ɠa ɠɛ è ʋɛ ga lɛbiya vaa wola, naama nuiti pɛ gaazu, wa niiti wo zeini daami wosuʋɛ.
Tɔɔzei zɔi nɔpɛ é ɓɔɠɔ wokomaalɛɛzu, naa maa ɠa yei, zɔi é ɓɔɠɔmaayeizu, naa unbu ɠa zeɠe.»

É ɠɛni ɓalaa toli nui ma: «Ni ɗa ɠɔnɔ golai ɓɛtɛna foloi ɓaa kpɔkɔi, mina naati toli, niiti ti ga è-wɔɔlaiti, è-ɠɛɛlointi, ɗa-nuiti, ɓaa è-zeiɲɔɠɔi niiti ti ɓɛtɛai, naa ɠa a kɛ tiya ɓalaa ti mina ʋa è lolisu, ti kɛɠala ɠɛ è ʋɛ.
Kɛlɛ ɗa fɛti laamii ɓɛtɛna, bala nuiti toli, ta maalɛɠɛfɛ nuiti, ta dɛkpu nuiti, naa ʋɛɛ gaazuɠole nuiti ba.
È undaa ɠa nɛ, tɔɔzei zobo ge la ti ʋɛ, ti ʋa kɛɠala ɠɛ è ʋɛ. Potogi ɠa ve è ya, siɛgi zu telebo nuiti ti wuzeɠezu la, ti ɠula saai ya.»
Zɔiti ti daamii woni, naa gila ge naama wooiti mɛnigai ma, é ɠɛni Yesu ma: «Undaanɛ nu ɠa ga naama nui, nii a daamii wo GALA ná-masadai zu.»
Yesu ɠɛni ma: «Zunui ta daamii wola ɠɛʋele ɓɛtɛni, é zɛba é nu mɔinmɔin toli.
Daami yeeɠɛɠalai zeeliai ma, é ná-botiɠɛ nui leʋeni ga naa ɠɛ nuiti ma, ti loligai: ‹À ʋaana, tɔɔzei ɠɔnɔgi ɠɛʋele ɓɛtɛʋɛ niina.›
Naati pɛ ti tɔɔzeini ga woozuɠulaga. Nu mɔungi ɠɛni botiɠɛ nui ma: ‹Gè kpala gila geyaʋɛ, kɛni gè li, gè wɛlɛ ná, nà è maanɛɛnɛzu, soma è màavaayɛ.›
Taɠili ge ɠɛ ma: ‹Gè wozawoli nikɛ puugɔ ɠeyaʋɛ, kɛni gè ti ɠɔɠɔ, nà è maanɛɛnɛzu, soma è màavaayɛ.›
Taɠili ge ɠɛ ma mɔnɔ: ‹Anzai vulua nɔ ɠa bɛ̀ feya, naa maaʋele ma, gè la zooga liizu.›

«Botiɠɛ nui ɠaleni ma, é naama ʋoluvaawogi wo maliɠii ma. Pɛlɛ kɛɛɠɛi wola yiiɠaawanani, é ɠɛ ná-botiɠɛ nui ma: ‹Li fala taazuʋɛ ma ɠoi zaamaʋɛti, ta koi yɔɠɔzu ʋeleiti ma, è bala nuiti toli, ta maalɛɠɛfɛ nuiti, ta gaazuɠole nuiti, naa ʋɛɛ dɛkpu nuiti ba.›
Naa ʋoluma botiɠɛ nui ʋaani, é ɠɛ ma: ‹Màliɠii, nii è deveai, naa ɠɛa, kɛlɛ seizu ɲakai ta ɠa dɛ ná.›
Pɛlɛ kɛɛɠɛi ɠɛni botiɠɛ nui ma: ‹Li pele wolaiti ta pele goiti su, è nuiti toli ga maaɓa, ti lɛ, naa ɠa a kɛ nà-pɛlɛi wuulaave.
Tɔɔzei gè bo wo ma ga gaamai, nui niiti ti loliga ɠɛa de, tanɔpɛ ge la niima ɠɔnɔgi ta ɠɔɠɔga.› »
Bɛbɛ wolai ɠɛni Yesu ʋolu pelei zu, é ɠaaʋoteni ti ma, é ɠɛ ti ma:
«Zɔi é ʋaazu pɔ̀, kɛni gè nɛɛ bɛ é leʋe kɛɛɠɛ ta dee ʋa, ta anzai ta ná-dointi, naa ʋɛɛ kɛɛɠɛlointi ta baazeelaiti ba, ta tɔ ɓɔɠɔi yɛnvui ʋa, ni naa laade é la zooga ɠɛɛzu ga nà-kaladopo.
Zɔi é la zaa wului zeɠeni, é ʋa ʋilɛ pòlu, é la zooga ɠɛɛzu ga nà-kaladopo.
«Wo zaama, zɔi é pɔ ga é pɛlɛ ɠaaɠooza to, kɛbɛ toɠa ɗa zei dɛ, é gaalugi wo, é ɠɛ kwɛɛ nii liegɔi é ʋaazu dɔɔzu, é pɛtɛ ɓalaa ni zobo ka bɛ, é botii naa ɠaaɓela, kɛlɛ?
Ni naa laade, a seɓasemai laana, toɠa ɠale botii wu, naa ʋoluma zɔiti pɛ ta ɠɛ pɛtɛsu, ta ɗa ɲɛɛɠula su,
ti ɗa ɠɛ ma: ‹Wɛlɛ zunui nii ʋa, é pɛlɛ logi lɔɔzeiɗai, é la zooni é ʋa gaaɓela.›

«Ɓaa masagi ɓɛ ɠa, ni toɠa pɔ é li ga kɔɔi bɔɔla masagi laalɔɠɔma, é la ɗa ga zei dɛ, é faiti buuɓɛ ga pagɔ, é ɠɛ kwɛɛ ni toɠa zoo liizu ga nu waapuugɔ (10.000), é ziɛ siliɲɔɠɔi wu, nii é ʋaazu tɔun pɔ ga nu waaʋuufelegɔ (20.000)?
Ni a kaana ga é la ziaa kɔɔi wu, siɛgi zu zɔi maaɠoozaai la dɛ, toɠa ɗa zɔɠɔzuɓɛtɛ nu ɠila teʋe, é ziilɛigi ɠaiziɛ ti yɔɠɔzu.
Ʋele ɠana é la mu, wo zaama, zɔi nɔpɛ é la ɠɛlɛni zeaɠɔligi pɛ ba, naa la zooga é ʋa ɠɛ ga nà-kaladopo.
«Kpoloi ʋagɛ. Kɛlɛ ni kpoloi ná-ɲɛmigi ɠa ɠulana ba, nu ɠa zoo feezu zea ɠale ʋolu?
É la mɔ ʋani zooi ʋɛ, é la mɔ ʋani kpoɠa pɔlɔi ʋɛ, nu ɠa ɗa pili ya eteaʋɛ. Zɔi faa mɛni goiyeɠe ba, naama nui nii mɛni.»
